backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing core game backend logic including access control, player profiles, daily limits, AR spots, planted coins, monster capture, geolocation distance checks, and Stripe payment integration.
CAPACITOR_BUILD_GUIDE.md: Empty or placeholder document intended for Capacitor build instructions.
CAPACITOR_MOBILE_GUIDE.md: Empty or placeholder document intended for Capacitor mobile setup guidance.
capacitor.config.ts: Empty or placeholder Capacitor configuration file.
DEEP_LINKING_SETUP.md: Empty or placeholder document intended for deep linking configuration notes.
feature_evidence.json: Machine-readable feature evidence report mapping implemented features to frontend files, components, test requirements, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten high-level summaries of key frontend files, pages, hooks, and components for documentation and planning.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point defining SEO metadata, Open Graph/Twitter tags, fonts, favicon, and mounting point for the React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React application configuring ThemeProvider and TanStack Router with all public routes, including the Treasury & Monetary Policy page.
frontend/src/components/ARSpotModal.tsx: Empty or placeholder component intended for AR spot interaction modal.
frontend/src/components/BottomNav.tsx: Empty or placeholder component intended for bottom navigation UI.
frontend/src/components/CoinInfoBottomPa: Empty or placeholder component intended to display coin details in a bottom panel.
frontend/src/components/CollectionComple: Empty or placeholder component intended to show collection completion feedback.
frontend/src/components/EnergyBar.tsx: Empty or placeholder component intended to visualize player energy status.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component rendering branding, contact info, compliance text, and bilingual strings via LanguageContext.
frontend/src/components/GameFooter.tsx: Empty or placeholder component intended for in-game footer UI.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Responsive global header with desktop and mobile navigation, language toggle (PT/EN), and TanStack Router links.
frontend/src/components/LanguageToggle.t: Empty or placeholder component intended for language switching UI.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: App layout wrapper providing LanguageContext, header, footer, and routed content outlet.
frontend/src/components/LegalModal.tsx: Empty or placeholder component intended to display legal information in a modal.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Empty or placeholder component intended for authentication/login actions.

frontend/src/components/PlantSuccessModa: Empty or placeholder component intended to show successful planting feedback.
frontend/src/components/PlayerHeader.tsx: Empty or placeholder component intended to display player status and stats.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Empty or placeholder component intended for initial player profile setup.
frontend/src/components/RescueConfirmati: Empty or placeholder component intended to confirm rescue actions.
frontend/src/components/ResgatarButton.t: Empty or placeholder component intended for rescue/claim button functionality.
frontend/src/components/TermsAndConditio: Empty or placeholder component intended to display terms and conditions.
frontend/src/components/TokenInfoModal.t: Empty or placeholder component intended to show detailed token metadata.
frontend/src/components/WelcomeBonusBann: Empty or placeholder component intended to display a welcome bonus notification.
frontend/src/contexts/LanguageContext.ts: Provides a React context for language selection (pt/en), persisted in localStorage, and exposes translated navigation and footer strings.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages a backend actor based on the current Internet Identity, handling anonymous vs authenticated actors and invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity authentication provider and hook, managing login, logout, identity persistence, and detailed login status state via Dfinity AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty hook file reserved for shared or custom React Query helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useSharedLocation.ts: Empty hook file intended for shared location or routing state logic.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining a luxury black/gold design system, light and dark themes, typography, animations, and custom UI utilities.
frontend/src/lib/capacitor-plugins.ts: Empty library file intended for Capacitor plugin integrations.
frontend/src/lib/deep-links.ts: Empty utility file reserved for deep link handling logic.
frontend/src/lib/offline-manager.ts: Empty utility file intended for offline or caching management.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Multilingual marketing page describing the project vision, luxury branding, and global scope using rich visuals and iconography.
frontend/src/pages/ARDistributionPage.ts: Page component displaying a multilingual overview of global AR spot distribution with maps, regional statistics, and styled visual sections.
frontend/src/pages/ARMode.tsx: Empty page file reserved for AR mode functionality.
frontend/src/pages/BancoCentral.tsx: Empty page file likely intended for central bank or monetary policy content.
frontend/src/pages/Colecao.tsx: Empty page file likely intended for a collection or NFT gallery feature.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Multilingual contact and support page presenting helpdesk email and website links in a styled layout.
frontend/src/pages/DAO.tsx: Empty page file reserved for DAO governance content.
frontend/src/pages/DAOPage.tsx: Renders a bilingual DAO governance page describing a purely conceptual voting, treasury, and proposal system with strong legal disclaimers. Uses cards and icons to present non-functional, educational DAO content.
frontend/src/pages/Distribuicao.tsx: File exists but contains no implementation; likely a placeholder for a future distribution-related page.
frontend/src/pages/GameSystemsPage.tsx: Displays a bilingual overview of core game mechanics such as energy, XP, AR monster capture, and token planting/rescue limits. Content is static and informational.
frontend/src/pages/GoldPaper.tsx: Implements a large, scrollable bilingual 'Gold Paper' document covering executive summary, tokenomics, AR distribution, DAO, roadmap, presale, technical architecture, and legal sections.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Main animated hero page with language toggle, dynamic text effects, and install CTA linking to the external app. Focuses on branding, visuals, and first impression.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Marketing-focused landing page with hero section, feature highlights, CTAs, and social links. Presents Quantumoney AR value proposition without language switching.
frontend/src/pages/LegalPage.tsx: Bilingual legal compliance page outlining GDPR, MiCA, KYC/AML, and risk disclaimers using icon-based cards. Content is static and informational.
frontend/src/pages/MapMode.tsx: File exists but has no content; likely intended for a future AR map or gameplay mode.
frontend/src/pages/Perfil.tsx: Empty file acting as a placeholder for a future user profile page.
frontend/src/pages/Presale.tsx: File exists with no implementation; appears to be an unused or legacy presale page.
frontend/src/pages/PresalePage.tsx: Bilingual presale overview page showing titles and static images for presale phases and progress dashboards. No interactive logic or transactions.
frontend/src/pages/PreVendaQTM.tsx: Empty file, likely reserved for a Portuguese-specific presale or QTM token presale page.
frontend/src/pages/QTMRules.tsx: Empty placeholder file likely intended for rules or terms related to QTM/QMY.
frontend/src/pages/QueimaDeflacao.tsx: Empty file, presumably reserved for future content about token burn and deflation mechanics.
frontend/src/pages/RoadmapPage.tsx: Renders a multilingual 2026 roadmap page showing quarterly milestones with styled cards and icons, driven by language context.
frontend/src/pages/SwapQTMICP.tsx: File is present but contains no implementation or exported logic.
frontend/src/pages/TechnicalPage.tsx: Displays a bilingual technical architecture overview describing the ICP/Motoko backend and React/TypeScript frontend stack.
frontend/src/pages/TokenomicsPage.tsx: Implements an interactive tokenomics page showing total supply and token distribution allocations with hover effects and multilingual content.
frontend/src/pages/TreasuryMonetaryPolic: Provides a detailed, multilingual conceptual overview of DAO treasury management, vesting, deflationary policy, timelines, and regulatory compliance with strong non-execution disclaimers.

Shows a bilingual informational page illustrating vesting schedules and deflation mechanics using charts and icon-based cards.

frontend/src/utils/bigint.ts: File is present but contains no implementation or exported logic.
frontend/src/utils/distance.ts: File is present but contains no implementation or exported logic.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Defines utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and hash parameters with sessionStorage support for routing state.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining dark mode, content paths, container settings, custom fonts, OKLCH-based luxury color palette, shadows, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata and state file describing scope, compliance constraints (MiCA/GDPR), phased documentation approach, and a catalog of existing frontend features and pages.
public/.well-known/apple-app-site-associ: Apple App Site Association file placeholder, used to configure iOS universal links and app-domain association.
public/.well-known/assetlinks.json: Android Digital Asset Links file placeholder, used to associate the web domain with an Android application for deep linking.
scripts/build-mobile.sh: Shell script placeholder intended for building or packaging the mobile application or related assets.
scripts/test-mobile.sh: Shell script placeholder intended for running tests or validation for the mobile build or environment.
